scripts.postinstall: cd server && yarn install && cd ../vscode-client && yarn install && cd ..
scripts.compile: cd server && yarn run compile && cd ../vscode-client && yarn run compile && cd ..
scripts.compile:client: cd vscode-client && yarn run compile  && cd ..
scripts.watch:client: cd vscode-client && yarn run compile:watch  && cd ..
scripts.compile:server: cd server && yarn run compile  && cd ..
scripts.watch:server: cd server && yarn run compile:watch  && cd ..
scripts.check: yarn run lint && yarn run compile && yarn run test
scripts.check:bail: yarn run lint:bail && yarn run compile && yarn run test
scripts.reinstall-server: npm uninstall -g bash-language-server && yarn compile:server && npm i -g ./server
